text:
Dear Colleagues,
As you know, [redacted_name] is leaving at the end of the month, and it is planning to arrange a farewell party for her on 31 October. During the party, it would be nice to give our present to her therefore if you would like to join, please kindly send your contributions to [redacted_name]’s below bank account by next Monday (14 October);
[redacted_name]
Denizbank
[redacted_info]
Thanks in advance.
trans:
Chers collègues,
Comme vous le savez, [redacted_name] nous quitte à la fin du mois, et nous organisons un pot de départ en son honneur le 31 octobre. Durant la soirée, ça serait sympa de lui offrir notre cadeau donc si vous souhaitez participer, merci d'envoyer votre contribution à l'IBAN de [redacted_name] ci-dessous avant lundi prochain (14 octobre) ;
[redacted_name]
Denizbank
[redacted_info]
Merci d'avance.
